title: Ticket #5038: DAGMan should take advantage of condor_submit -singlecluster, -maxjobs
description:
Have DAGMan take advantage of the new -maxjobs and single-cluster arguments to condor_submit to enforce its requirements that a submit generate only a single cluster, and if DAGMAN_PROHIBIT_MULTI_JOBS set, only a single proc.

Probably have a knob to turn this off for compatibility with older condor_submits, or any wrapper that someone (e.g., LIGO) might put around condor_submit.
creator: wenger
